arts.ttl: Borussia Dortmund interim coach Mike Tullberg to oversee UEFA Champions League clash
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund interim coach Mike Tullberg is set to remain at the helm for BVB's final UEFA Champions League group-stage match against Shakhtar Donetsk on Wednesday, the club confirmed on Saturday evening. Following the game, Dortmund confirmed on Saturday evening that Tullberg will reassume control from the sidelines for Wednesday evening's final league phase fixture in the Champions League, at home to Shakhtar Donetsk.

arts.ttl: Post Match Reaction: Dortmund Show Signs of Life in Bremen Draw
arts.sum: Even before the departures, Dortmund looked more active in the game than we have seen in the past month, primarily due to the attacking impetus of Karim Adeyemi. Guirassy’s goal in the 28th minute was scrappy, but it marks the first good thing Julian Brandt has done in recent memory and Dortmund’s first goal from open play in what feels like ages.

arts.ttl: Ten-man Dortmund squander two-goal lead as Bremen fight back for dramatic draw
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund and Werder Bremen played out a thrilling 2-2 draw in a match filled with drama, including a red card and a remarkable comeback. Nico Schlotterbeck's early red card left Dortmund a man down for much of the match.

Serhou Guirassy (28.) and an own goal by Marco Friedl (51.) gave ten-man Dortmund a 2-0 lead after Nico Schlotterbeck's early red card (21.). Nico Schlotterbeck's early red card left Dortmund a man down for much of the match.

arts.ttl: Sebastian Kehl comments on Karim Adeyemi’s future amid Napoli interest
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund sporting director Sebastian Kehl has denied reports suggesting that Karim Adeyemi is about to join Italian side Napoli. Speaking to Sky Germany – as cited by WAZ –…

arts.ttl: Borussia Dortmund ultras send message to the club’s hierarchy
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund are going through somewhat of a tumultuous spell at the moment following the sacking of Nuri Sahin while there’s a power struggle at the top, and now the…

arts.ttl: Match Thread: Post-Sahin Dortmund Host Werder Bremen with a New Coach at the Helm
arts.sum: Use those and don’t share any illegal streams in the comments. No abusing of other commentators or match officials.

arts.ttl: Atletico Madrid target Arsenal left back Oleksandr Zinchenko but face competition from German giants
arts.sum: SIMON JONES: Zinchenko joined the Gunners in 2022 from Man City , and was a major boost to Mikel Arteta 's plans at the time, but has found himself falling down the packing order.

arts.ttl: Nicolas Kuhn says Celtic have won Champions League respect back after Dortmund reality check
arts.sum: The Hoops ace reckons Brendan Rodgers' side can head into the last 16 play-offs with belief.

arts.ttl: Brentford want at least €50m for Borussia Dortmund target Kevin Schade
arts.sum: As we enter the final week of the transfer window, Borussia Dortmund are moving to strengthen their squad. Kevin Schade has been a long-term target for Die Schwarzgelben, but they…
